Clifton.Teterboro station:
Teterboro, formerly known as Williams Avenue, is a NJ Transit rail station on the Pascack Valley Line. The station is in Hasbrouck Heights, in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States, and is located on Williams Avenue near Route 17 and Route 46, near Teterboro Airport.
Teterboro is served by weekday trains only, and with the exception for one early morning train from Hoboken, there is no weekend or holiday service at this station.
